Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the establishment of rent adjustments and prohibition of fuel pass-along charges; repealer
Summary: Relates to the establishment of rent adjustments and prohibition of fuel pass-along charges.
LawCode: Amd §26-405, rpld sub g ¶1 sub¶¶ (l) & (n), add §26-407.1, NYC Ad Cd; amd §4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to the establishment of rent adjustments and prohibition of fuel pass-along charges; and repealing certain provisions of the administrative code of the city of New York relating thereto
